dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and high-risk investment decisions to achieve high potential gains.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, avoiding high-risk investments in favor of low-risk returns.

dimensions.label: Technical Literacy
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly skilled and proficient in using complex technologies, such as coding and data analysis.
Your FarTwin will have a basic understanding of technology and its applications, but may struggle with more advanced concepts.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as images and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through listening to lectures or discussions.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write in a formal and professional tone, using complex vocabulary and structured sentences.
Your FarTwin will write in a casual and conversational tone, using colloquialisms and relaxed sentence structures.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logical reasoning and evidence-based decision-making to solve problems.
Your FarTwin will rely on intuition and gut feelings to make decisions, often ignoring data or evidence.

dimensions.label: Social Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly social and outgoing, seeking to connect with others in both personal and professional settings.
Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with smaller groups or solo, valuing their alone time and individuality.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly creative and open to new ideas, often taking risks in their artistic endeavors.
Your FarTwin will prefer traditional or established methods, relying on tried-and-true approaches rather than innovative ones.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach financial priorities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and frugality, avoiding unnecessary expenses and living modestly.
Your FarTwin will prioritize spending and generosity, often investing in luxury items or charitable causes.
